mapper.select: SELECT M.employee_id AS approver_id, M.employee_name AS approver_name, D.department_id AS department_id, D.department_name AS department_name, G.grade AS grade_name, J.job_title AS job_title_name, L.seq AS seq FROM tbl_approval_default_line L /* 기안자(Me) 정보: 내 부서 ID 확인용 */ LEFT JOIN tbl_employee Me ON Me.employee_id = #{employeeId} /* 타겟 부서 결정: 0이면 내 부서, 아니면 지정 부서 */ INNER JOIN tbl_department D ON D.department_id = (CASE WHEN L.department_id = 0 THEN Me.department_id ELSE L.department_id END) /* 부서장(Manager) 조인 */ INNER JOIN tbl_employee M ON D.manager_id = M.employee_id /* 직급/직책 정보 */ LEFT JOIN tbl_grade G ON M.grade_id = G.grade_id LEFT JOIN tbl_job_title J ON M.job_title_id = J.job_title_id WHERE L.template_id = #{templateId} AND L.seq > 1 ORDER BY L.seq ASC
